rows.label: tlk41700121_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard the Divine Beast battleship
was attacked. And to save that
wanted girl, Nia, no less.

rows.label: tlk41700121_03_msg0002
rows.name:
They're up against an opponent that
even Superbia's strongest Driver,
Meleph-sama, couldn't capture.

rows.label: tlk41700121_03_msg0003
rows.name:
There's no way the people of Torigo could
possibly win. The best solution is to just
keep quiet and wait for the problem to go away.

rows.label: tlk41700121_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I can't bear the thought of the
city being destroyed by getting
caught in the crossfire.
